summary: Simple modes having a bit of a wiki, namely knowledge of the Daedric artifact.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#f4f4f4]Simple modes having a bit of a wiki, namely knowledge of the Daedric artifact. [/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]Maud is a book and can be found in Whiterun in the " House of warm winds " on the second floor near the bed the player to the left of the entrance to the room. [/color]

[color=#f4f4f4]As it is written in a mission , you can get one or another artifact[/color]
[u]
[/u][u][color=#ff0000]Installation:[/color][/u][color=#f4f4f4] Unzip the folder with the game[/color]


[u][color=#ff0000][url=http://adf.ly/uh5WE]Download[/url][/color][/u][/b]
author: I am
